languages.text: {n}В безжизненных глазах арбитра загорается что-то напоминающее гнев.{/n} "Сбор десятины — это священный столп и признак того, что власть Империума крепка. Без нее миры решат, что они свободны от долга, и употребят появившийся ресурс на собственные нужды. Захотят ли они снова платить десятину, когда откроется {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Зев{/g}? Нет. Начнутся волнения, бунты. Именно поэтому десятину важно собирать всегда, независимо от обстоятельств".

{n}Something resembling anger sparks in her lifeless eyes.{/n} "Tithe collection is a sacred pillar and a sign that the dominion of the Imperium is strong. Without it, worlds would think that they were free of all obligations and use the resources for their own needs. Would they feel compelled to pay the tithe again after the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} reopened? Of course not. There would be unrest, riots, disorder. This is why it is important to collect the tithe at all times, regardless of circumstance."
languages.original_text: {n}В безжизненных глазах арбитра загорается что-то напоминающее гнев.{/n} "Сбор десятины — это священный столп и признак того, что власть Империума крепка. Начнутся волнения, бунты. Именно поэтому десятину важно собирать всегда, независимо от обстоятельств".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something resembling anger lights up in the arbitrator's lifeless eyes.{/n} "The collection of tithe is a sacred pillar and a sign that the power of the Imperium is strong. Without it, worlds will think they are free of obligation and use the resources for their own needs. Will they want to pay tithe again after the Maw opens? Of course not. There will be unrest, riots, disorder. This is why it is important to collect the tithe at all times, regardless of circumstance."

languages.text: {n}Ves una chispa de algo similar a la furia en sus ojos sin vida.{/n} «La recolección del diezmo es un pilar sagrado y una prueba de que el dominio del Imperium es fuerte. Sin ella, los mundos se creerán libres de toda obligación y usarán los recursos para sus propios fines. ¿Cree que se sentirían obligados a volver a pagar el diezmo cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Fauces{/g} se abrieran? Habría protestas, revueltas, disturbios... Por eso es tan importante recolectar el diezmo en el plazo establecido, independientemente de las circunstancias».
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling anger sparks in her lifeless eyes.{/n} "Tithe collection is a sacred pillar and a sign that the dominion of the Imperium is strong. languages.text: {n}她原本死气沉沉的双眼中，突然迸发出某种类似于怒火的东西。{/n}“什一税是帝国的神圣支柱，也是帝国力量与统治的标志。若是无需缴纳什一税，众多世界就会认为他们没有义务为帝国效力，会把这些资源用来满足自己的需要。如果真的停止征税，等到{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}巨口{/g}重新开放之后，那些人还会乖乖地再次缴纳什一税吗？肯定不会。届时重新征税，那些世界肯定会发生暴乱。因此，无论什么时候都必须收取帝国什一税，这一点不容置疑。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling anger sparks in her lifeless eyes.{/n} "Tithe collection is a sacred pillar and a sign that the dominion of the Imperium is strong. Without it, worlds would think that they were free of all obligations and use the resources for their own needs. Would they feel compelled to pay the tithe again after the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} reopened? Of course not. There would be unrest, riots, disorder. This is why it is important to collect the tithe at all times, regardless of circumstance."

languages.text: {n}彼女の生気のない目に怒りに似た何かが火花を散らしている。{/n}「租税徴収は帝国の支配権が強力であることを示す神聖な柱であり、印です。それがなければ、惑星はすべての義務から解放されたと考えて、自分自身のために資源を使うことを考えるでしょう。{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}マウ{/g}が再び開いたとしてもう一度租税を払おうという気になるでしょうか？もちろん、そうはなりません。混乱し、暴動が起き、無秩序になるでしょう。こういった理由で、状況にかかわらず、どんな時も租税を集めることが重要なのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling anger sparks in her lifeless eyes.{/n} "Tithe collection is a sacred pillar and a sign that the dominion of the Imperium is strong. Without it, worlds would think that they were free of all obligations and use the resources for their own needs. Would they feel compelled to pay the tithe again after the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} reopened? Of course not. There would be unrest, riots, disorder. This is why it is important to collect the tithe at all times, regardless of circumstance."

languages.text: {n}Une lueur évoquant la colère embrase subitement ses yeux sans vie.{/n} « La collecte de la dîme est l'un des piliers sacrés de l'Imperium, et un témoignage de sa domination. Sans elle, les mondes placés sous son autorité se croiraient exemptés de toute obligation et gaspilleraient leurs ressources à des fins personnelles. Accepteraient-ils sans broncher de renouer avec la tradition une fois la {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Gueule{/g} rouverte ? Bien sûr que non. Il y aurait des troubles, des émeutes... Le chaos généralisé, en somme. Voilà pourquoi il est capital d'assurer la collecte de la dîme en toutes circonstances. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling anger sparks in her lifeless eyes.{/n} "Tithe collection is a sacred pillar and a sign that the dominion of the Imperium is strong. Without it, worlds would think that they were free of all obligations and use the resources for their own needs. languages.text: {n}Cansız gözlerinde öfkeye benzer bir kıvılcım çakıyor.{/n} "Aşar toplamak, kutsalımızdır ve İmparatorluk hâkimiyetinin güçlü olduğunun bir işaretidir. Aşar olmasa dünyalar, tüm yükümlülüklerden kurtulduklarını sanıp kaynakları kendi ihtiyaçları için kullanırdı. {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Ağız{/g} yeniden açılınca aşar ödemek zorunda hissederler miydi? Hiç sanmam. Huzursuzluk, isyanlar, kargaşa olurdu. İşte bu yüzden koşullar fark etmeksizin aşarı her daim toplamak pek mühimdir."
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling anger sparks in her lifeless eyes.{/n} "Tithe collection is a sacred pillar and a sign that the dominion of the Imperium is strong. Without it, worlds would think that they were free of all obligations and use the resources for their own needs. Would they feel compelled to pay the tithe again after the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} reopened? Of course not. There would be unrest, riots, disorder. This is why it is important to collect the tithe at all times, regardless of circumstance."

languages.text: {n}Ein Anflug von Zorn blitzt in ihren leblosen Augen auf.{/n} "Die Eintreibung des Zehnts ist eine heilige Säule und ein Symbol für die Stärke des Imperiums. Ohne ihn würde so manche Welt denken, dass sie keinerlei Verpflichtungen hat und mit den Ressourcen ihre eigenen Bedürfnisse stillen kann. Sähen sie sich genötigt, den Zehnt wieder abzuführen, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Schlund{/g} wieder offen ist? Natürlich nicht. Es gäbe Unruhen, Aufstände und Chaos. Deshalb ist es wichtig, den Zehnt ungeachtet der Umstände zu allen Zeiten einzutreiben."
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling anger sparks in her lifeless eyes.{/n} "Tithe collection is a sacred pillar and a sign that the dominion of the Imperium is strong.
